description:
First off, apologies for the long gap since our last in-person meetup. Rest assured, we are still active. The current organising team has just been caught up with life, family, work, and other commitments.

We're eager to connect with members interested in contributing to the group, whether by giving a talk, hosting events, helping organize, or simply generating fresh ideas.

Like previous socials, there are no scheduled talks this time. We have a reserved area in a pub, perfect for engaging conversations with fellow members. As is our tradition, and while the kitty lasts, the first drink is on SWmobile!

If you are a first-time member or don’t know anyone and would prefer to pre-meet so you can arrive with others, please send us a message via meetup.com, and we’ll arrange it.

For those interested in speaking at future events, please fill out the CFP form at [http://cfp.swmobile.org](http://cfp.swmobile.org).

We look forward to seeing you there!
title: Summer Social
